Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list.MediaListPlayerEventListener

  • Packages that use MediaListPlayerEventListener 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.component
    Provides higher-level components used to create basic media players with the minimum of application code.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list
    Provides the classes necessary to create and control native media list players.

    • Uses of MediaListPlayerEventListener in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.component

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.component that implement MediaListPlayerEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AudioListPlayerComponent
      Implementation of an audio list player.
      class  CallbackMediaListPlayerComponent
      Implementation of a callback "direct-rendering" media list player.
      class  CallbackMediaListPlayerComponentBase
      Base implementation of a callback "direct-rendering" media player.
      class  EmbeddedMediaListPlayerComponent
      Implementation of an embedded media list player.

    • Uses of MediaListPlayerEventListener in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list that implement MediaListPlayerEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  MediaListPlayerEventAdapter
      Default implementation of the media player event listener.
      Methods in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list with parameters of type MediaListPlayerEventListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void EventApi.addMediaListPlayerEventListener​(MediaListPlayerEventListener listener)
      Add a component to be notified of media player events.
      void EventApi.removeMediaListPlayerEventListener​(MediaListPlayerEventListener listener)
      Remove a component that was previously interested in notifications of media player events.
